about_me_text1: As a Full-Stack Developer, I have a solid academic background backed by Academlo in Mexico and a certification as a Software Analysis and Development Technologist awarded by SENA in Colombia. My focus is on creating technological solutions that drive your company's efficiency and growth. With a fervent desire to learn and perfect my coding skills, I am ready to contribute innovation, commitment, and dedication to your team.
about_me_text2: As a Full-Stack Developer trained at Academlo (Mexico) and certified as a Software Analysis and Development Technologist by SENA (Colombia). I focus on creating solutions that drive business efficiency, with a constant commitment to improvement. I bring innovation and dedication to your team.

full_stack-work.title: Full Stack Developer - Freelance Project for Client (TheraClinic)
full_stack-work.description: I led the development of a system for a clinical practice that manages appointments, patients, medical histories, and exams. I handled the analysis, design, development, and unit testing. The project is running successfully in a local environment as per the client's request.
